00024 template<int size, class T = double>
00025 class ColumnVector : public Matrix<size, 1, T>, public VectorBase<T>
00026 {
00027   public:
00028     inline ColumnVector() {}
00032     inline ColumnVector(const ColumnVector<size, T> &v);
00036     inline ColumnVector(const Matrix<size,1,T> &m);
00042     inline ColumnVector(const Vector<size,T> &v);
00047     virtual ~ColumnVector(){}
00051     virtual T *getElementsPointer() const { return (T *) &(this->d_element[0][0]); }
00055     inline virtual T getElement(int index) const;
00060     inline virtual void setElement(int index, T value);
00066     virtual bool isRowVector() const {return false;}
00070     virtual int getNumElements() const {return size;}
00074     inline T &operator()(int index);
00082     inline T operator()(int index) const;
00087     inline ColumnVector<size, T> &operator=(const VectorBase<T> &v);
00092     MatrixInitializer<T> operator=(const T &value);
00102  private:
00103 };
